outputs.output_descr: The expected outputs from SPARC project are two folds: (1) Mainstreamed adaptation in broader development frameworks at country level and in targeted vulnerable areas, and (2) Diversified and strengthened livelihoods and sources of income for vulnerable people in targeted areas.

project_descr: Strategic Planning and Action to strengthen climate Resilience of rural Communities in Nusa Tenggara Timor province (SPARC) - Project Preparation Grant
